General.Name: Zhejiang Shuanghuan Driveline Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Shuanghuan Driveline Co.,Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells gears and related components in China and internationally. It manufactures and develops transmission core components for passenger vehicles, such as AT, DCT, transfer case gear, synchronizer, DHT, CVT gear shaft, planetary gear, scissor gear, and engine-gear ring, as well as products for electric vehicles and differential mechanism; engine gear, automatic transmission gear, and axle gear for commercial vehicles; output shaft gear; small spiral bevel gear; rail transit gear; piston shaft for wind power generation; and all-terrain vehicle gear and Haomai 50 gear. The company's products are used in powertrain and transmission devices in automobiles; electric motors, reduction gears, and power drive devices in new energy vehicles; deceleration and transmission devices in off-road machinery; and driving and transmission application in industrial robots, rail transit, wind power generation, and power tools, as well as in consumer field gear, energy equipment, and other industries. Zhejiang Shuanghuan Driveline Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.
